zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理中，短期观望为主]
zh.content:
目前AVAX/USD价格处于震荡整理阶段，价格在9.59和9.78之间波动，未能突破明显的支撑或阻力位。价格接近20日简单移动平均线（SMA 20，9.99），说明市场暂时缺乏明确的趋势方向。考虑到当前未出现强烈的趋势信号，短期内可能继续维持区间波动。

技术指标方面，MACD为负值（-0.074），未见明显的金叉或死叉，表明短期内卖压较为明显。RSI数据未提供，无法进一步确认市场的超买或超卖状态。因此，技术面显示AVAX/USD可能维持弱势震荡，缺乏突破力。

支撑位方面，9.59附近提供了一定的支撑，而9.78为短期内的阻力位。若价格突破9.78，可能会短期内上行至更高的区间；反之，若跌破9.59，则可能会测试9.50或更低的位置。当前市场情绪较为谨慎，短期内价格波动较为有限。

建议投资者在当前市场环境下保持观望，避免在震荡区间内进行过于激进的操作。如果价格突破9.78或跌破9.59，可根据具体走势调整策略。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
> search("You are a professional cryptocurrency analyst. Use professional but accessible language\n4. No labels, no meta-commentary\n5. Start immediately with the content (no title needed)\n\nBegin:")

The current **AVAX/USD price action** around *9.60* reflects continued downside pressure beneath the short–term 20‑period SMA at *9.99*, signalling that bearish control remains intact and the trend is still below key moving averages. While the slight intraday dip follows the recent sideways range, the inability to reclaim the SMA suggests sellers are edging out buyers on small rallies, and the broader trend structure favors consolidation or further decline unless a decisive uptick occurs. Recent external analyses highlight continued weakness and a bearish outlook on daily charts, reinforcing this view. 

**Momentum indicators** paint a mixedis | CoinLore](https://www.coinlore.com/coin/avalanche/technical-analysis?utm_source=chatgpt.com)** · *coinlore.com* · 2026/2/2
> Technical analysis for Avalanche AVAX including RSI, MACD, moving averages EMA and SMA, historical volatility, bollinger bands and more.


**Momentum indicators** paint a mixed picture: MACD remains negative around *-0.07*, showing bearish momentum bias without clear signal crossover, while the absence of an RSI reading complicates interpretation but separate sources show extended oversold conditions in broader timeframes. Negative MACD and oversold oscillators can imply that downward momentum persists, yet oversold conditions might eventually invite short‑covering rallies if buyers step in near supportes. 

From a **support and resistance standpoint**, immediate support levels cluster around *9.41–9.68* on short intraday measurements, with slightly stronger structural support near *9.90* and *~9.90–10.00* psychologically. On the upside, resistance begins near the SMA (~9.99) and strengthens above *10.10–10om a **support and resistance standpoint**, immediate support levels cluster around *9.41–9.68* on short intraday measurements, with slightly stronger structural support near *9.90* and *~9.90–10.00* psychologically. On the upside, resistance begins near the SMA (~9.99) and strengthens above *10.10–10.20* from pivot point calculations. Breaking above *10.20* with volume could open lifts toward *11.15*–*11.43*, but failure to hold the near support range risks deeper pullbacks toward *9.30* or lower. 

In terms of **tradingTechnical analysis | CoinLore](https://www.coinlore.com/coin/avalanche/technical-analysis?utm_source=chatgpt.com)** · *CoinLore* · 2026/2/2

In terms of **trading suggestions**, a cautious stance makes sense: consider *range‑bound strategies* around established support until clear bullish momentum develops above the 20‑SMA with confirming volume, or lean *shorter exposures* when price weakens below *9.50* with widened stop losses. Momentum traders might look for MACD signal line interactions or oversold RSI rebounds as entry triggers, but risk management is key given prevailing bearish bias and volatility.
